text:
Question 79) Survivors of the tragedy who destroyed approximately 60 houses in Bumba hill in the northern zone of Niter√≥i (RJ) still argue that the sliding has been caused by an explosion caused by methane gas, as this location was a dump between the 1960s and 1980s.
The gas mentioned in the text is produced
A) As a byproduct of bacterial aerobic breathing.
B) by anaerobic degradation of organic matter by bacteria.
C) as a product of photosynthesis of autotrophic multicellular organisms.
D) by the chemical transformation of carbon dioxide under anaerobic conditions.
E) by conversion, by chemical oxidation, of carbon dioxide under aerobic conditions.
